githawaliya 1 onlayin bayibalaya | nawa lowa pariwarthanaya githawaliya 1:1-6 1 dushtayange awawada nopiligaththawu,+pawkarayan yana mangehi nogiyawu,+samachchal karannan samanga asuru nokalawu+ manushyaya santhoshawathya.+ 2 yehowa dewige nithiya kiyawimen ohu mahath prithiyak labanneya.+ohu diwa ra dewige nithiya kiyawa ee gana gambaurin kalpana karanneya.+ 3 ohu diya dahara asala sitewwawu,+niyama warayata pala hatagannawu,+kola malawi noyannawu gasak men wanneya.+ohu karana sama deyakma sarthaka wanneya.+ 4 namuth dushtayo ohu ha samana nowethi.owun sulangin gasagena yana dahayiya meni.+ 5 winishchayedi dushtayanta anumathiya labenne natha.+pawkarayanta dharmishtayan athare sthanayakda natha.+ 6 yehowa dewi dharmishtayan yana margaya hondin danneya.+namuth dushtayage margaya winasha wanneya.+ githawaliya 1

peradeniya wishwawidyalayiya aaranchi marga pawasana paridi sampradayika peradeniyata adala rag karthawyayaya me wara yam asarthaka bawak athkaragana athibawa wartha weyi...hamadama mekala wana paradi dan kandayamak pamina rag eka patan gena thibe..deshakawarun wisin deshana pawathwima thawamath boho sthana wala aarambha kota nathath mulika padamala katayuthu medinawala kereyi..rag kriyadamayahi nama dan dan nawakayin piliganme wadapiliwela nathnam pariwasa kalaya lesa wenas atha..nawakawada panathata sisunta nawakawadaya dima waradaki..eheth ee kisiwak samanya lokayen hudakala wi pihiti peradeniya sarasawiyata adala wedayi yanna gataluwaki..eheth pasugiyadineka hostal walata nodanwa maha shishya sangamaya magin sanwidhanaya karana lada deshanayakata sisun balen ragena gos athi athara ehidi sarasawi ithihasaya sisunta kiya di thibenne ema wedikawema sarasawi aacharya mahathekda sitiddiya..inpasu dina sampradayika lesa ithihasaya lamungen asa athi athara wiya yuthu lesama ese kimata bari sisun parushawachana praharawalata dadiwa lakwa atha..mema nawakayin piliganme wadasatahanata parusha wachana aniwarya wana athara theruma dana ho nodana kiyana ee nosarup wadan sisun wisin iwasa wadara liya yuthu weyi..ese kantha newasikagara walata nodannawa sisun raskara sangam walata nawaka sisun ras karaganme wadapiliwela paripalanaya magin ho wenath parshawayak magin nithi anshawalata yomukara inpasu nawaka sisun saha jeshtayin yana deparshawayama raskarawa nawaka wadaya dimath ewan wadayak widimath yana karana dekama waradi bawa pawasa athi athara min pasu ewan karanawala niratha wena aya wethoth ee aya nithiya hamuwata pamunuwana bawa danwa atha..inpasu kantimata nawaka sisun nopaminenne manda saha thawath karana pilibada prashna kirim kara atha..ee adala nithagnya mahatha digin digatama samahara awthawala randi sitina bawin niyamitha kala satahanata anuwa rag ekata adalawa pawathina wisheshanga pawathwimata nohakiwa sisun asarana wi siti..esema rag kara ho rag winda asuwana sisun wethoth owunge panthi thahanam kirima ho shishya bhawaya ahosi kirimata pasubata nowana bawada ee aadala nithignya mahatha pawasa atha...esema dipawali dinayeda sisunta wiweka ganmata nodi randawagena nawakayin piliganme wadakatayuthuwalata sisun balenma dayaka karagath bawata peradeniya injineru pita aaranchi marga pawasayi....

me mathawada deka atharama aprakashithasammuthiyak pawathi.me siyallo wada karanne sudu kodi kathawa fonseka kiwwada nadda yannagana wina ebadu siduwimak aththata siduwida yanna gana nowe.sirabharayata pathwana /yatathwana deshapalanasirakaruwan nadu wibhagayakin thorawa mara damima jathyanthara nithiyata anuwa yuda waradak wana atharajathyanthara nithiya pasekin thabuwath manushika arthayen ho deshapalanika arthayen ebadumaradamim anumatha kala nohaka.deshapalana sirakaruwan mara damima lankawe padada dhanapathi rajyayechiragatha puruddaki.1971di ha 1989 di dakune satankami paramparawan dekak menma emaparamparawanta nayakathwaya sapayu nayakayan da shishta sammatha watinakam pagadamamin godanagathibena rajyaye mema kaෲrabhawayema goduru bawata pathwuha.mathawadiwa wenath dhrawayaka sthanagatha wuwada 2009 di  uthure  tharuna paramparawatada nawatha abhimukha wanuye eda dakunagoduru karagath rajyaye padadabhawayamayi.
